import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; class Newacc extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ firstName: '', lastName: '', iD: '', salary: '', homeNum: '', workNum: '', cellNum: '', eMail: '', account: 'Cheque', } this.onChange=this.onChange.bind(this) } onChange(event) { this.setState({ account: event.target.value }) } render () { return (
New Account

Create a New Account

Accounts

{this.state.account}

Fill in Account Details

Personal Details

Title:

First Name: {this.setState({firstName: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.firstName} type="text" name="amount" />

Last Name: {this.setState({lastName: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.lastName} type="text" name="amount" />

ID Number: {this.setState({iD: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.iD} type="text" name="amount" />

Contact Details

Salary: {this.setState({salary: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.salary} type="text" name="amount" />

Home Phone Number: {this.setState({homeNum: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.homeNum} type="text" name="amount" />

Work Phone Number: {this.setState({workNum: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.workNum} type="text" name="amount" />

Cell Number: {this.setState({cellNum: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.cellNum} type="text" name="amount" />

E-mail Address: {this.setState({eMail: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.eMail} type="text" name="amount" />

) } } export default Newacc
